field.name: description
field.value:
As several facilities might require configuration for specific method, implement a standard way to associate information with it.
<component id="something" isTransactional="true">
<methods> <method name="Save" transaction="RequiresNew" /> </methods>
</component>
The model builder contributor should populate a map so the facility can quick access the config node using the MethodInfo instance. Skip this if the methods node is not present.
